name: Driving Me Crazy
description:
Rush hour. The traffic is out of control. Others block the streets and drive like crazy. As always. Why? Couldn’t they just all drive perfectly fine, like me? 

But today is my lucky day, I am the first one on the roads. No Traffic. Nobody. I am not like the others I won’t block the roads...

-

In this little game it’s your task to drive vehicles to their destination. But keep the traffic under control as you will have to drive through the traffic with your following vehicles.

This game was our submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

-- 

We lost control over time and therefore a bug slipped through our QA which prevents you from showing the controls - which occasionally change ;) Good luck!

Bugfixed version:  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TLZ6kKm4zmrVTcsF5otNhVRBw4uEtAJg/view?usp=shari...
